text: ane anathona dhana pase na ja'o, parantu evi rite je srestha hoya, tyam sudhi ke te potani pukhtavaye pahonci jaya ane mapa-tola purepurum karo, n'yayathi, ame ko'i vyaktine teni saktithi vadhare takalipha nathi apata, ane jyare tame vata karo to n'yaya karo, bhalene te vyakti saga sambandhi manthi hoya, ane allaha ta'ala sathe je vacana karyu che tene purum karo, a vastuno adesa allaha ta'ala'e tamane bhara purvaka apyo che jethi tame samajo
